trans-unit.source: Main plugin of the extension. Provides post list and detail view. Enables users to create comments.
trans-unit.target: Main plugin of the extension. Provides post list and detail view. Enables users to create comments.

trans-unit.source: This plugin manages all blog related subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: This plugin manages all blog related subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: This plugin provides a simple form which enables users to subscribe for new blog posts.
trans-unit.target: This plugin provides a simple form which enables users to subscribe for new blog posts.

trans-unit.source: This plugin displays a list of your blog posts, nested by month and sorted by date.
trans-unit.target: This plugin displays a list of your blog posts, nested by month and sorted by date.

trans-unit.source: This plugin renders a RSS feed. Needs additional TypoScript!
trans-unit.target: This plugin renders a RSS feed. Needs additional TypoScript!

trans-unit.source: This plugin displays all blog categories including sub categories
trans-unit.target: This plugin displays all blog categories including sub categories

trans-unit.source: This plugin displays a list of the latest blog posts.
trans-unit.target: This plugin displays a list of the latest blog posts.

trans-unit.source: This plugin displays a list of the latest comments.
trans-unit.target: This plugin displays a list of the latest comments.
